keyMoments.title: Falsely Accused of Assassination Attempt
keyMoments.description: The Galley-La Company concludes that the Straw Hat Pirates are responsible for the attack on Iceburg based on his testimony identifying Robin as one of the attackers.
keyMoments.significance: This false accusation turns Water 7 against the crew and sets up the major conflict that drives the Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs.

keyMoments.title: Public Accusation Spreads Throughout Water 7
keyMoments.description: Word spreads throughout Water 7 that the Straw Hat Pirates attempted to assassinate the city's beloved mayor and shipwright, Iceburg.
keyMoments.significance: Isolates the Straw Hats from any potential allies in Water 7 and creates a hostile environment that will drive them into increasingly desperate situations.

statusHistory.note: Crew is falsely accused of attempting to assassinate Iceburg

keyMoments.title: Franky Confronts Luffy
keyMoments.description: Franky, leader of the Franky Family, challenges Luffy to a fight over the destruction of his house and the attacks on his gang members.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the ongoing conflict between the Franky Family and the Straw Hats, which began with Usopp's beating.

keyMoments.title: Franky Objects to Galley-La Interference
keyMoments.description: Franky warns the Galley-La Company not to interfere in his personal fight with Luffy, showing his code of honor.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Franky's sense of fair play and personal honor even when fighting enemies.

statusHistory.note: Franky is engaged in battle with Luffy

keyMoments.title: Turns Against the Straw Hat Pirates
keyMoments.description: After hearing Iceburg's testimony identifying Robin as one of his attackers, the Galley-La Company concludes that the Straw Hats must be dealt with immediately.
keyMoments.significance: Transforms the Galley-La Company from potential allies into active antagonists pursuing the Straw Hat Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Intervenes in Luffy vs. Franky Battle
keyMoments.description: The Galley-La Company rushes to stop Luffy and Franky from destroying the shipyard, entering the battle themselves.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates the conflict into a three-way battle and demonstrates the Company's willingness to use force against the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Paulie Attacks Luffy
keyMoments.description: Paulie uses his Rope Action technique to attack Luffy, marking the first direct combat between the Galley-La Company and the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Galley-La Company's combat capabilities and their determination to stop the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Kaku and Lucci Display Combat Skills
keyMoments.description: Kaku and Rob Lucci enter the fight, displaying unusually powerful combat abilities for shipwrights.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows the true identities of Kaku and Lucci as CP9 agents through their exceptional fighting prowess.

statusHistory.note: Company actively pursuing the Straw Hat Pirates as criminals
